fulltext:
PERSONAL PROFILE 
LY HONG PHAT 
DOB: 14 May, 1990 
Tel: (+84) 976 985 011 
Email: lyhongphat14@gmail.com 
LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/phat-ly-449018124/ 
SUMMARY 
Having about 07 years’ experience in many software projects with Tester roles, being worked in Testing 
technologies, manual, automation testing and software development.    
Having Software Testing certificates from Carnegie Mellon University include period that being trained and 
worked in the company, strong background such as analysis and design, implementation and execution, 
evaluating issues and report skills.   
Having full equipped with critical thinking, teamwork and soft skills to fit with international work 
environment. 
Be friendly, responsible, persistent, passion and having lots of enthusiasm to learn and a sincere desire 
to work in professional environment. 
Expertise includes: 
 
Knowledge of operating systems. 
 
Experience in Web, Application testing. 
 
Software testing strategies/knowledge. 
 
Business automation domain 
knowledge. 
 
Requirement analysis.   
 
UX, UI testing.  
 
Embedded system testing. 
 
Test management.   
CAREER HISTORY AND EXPERIENCE: 
Testing Projects: 
Feb 2017 – Present: 
QC Engineer 
Testing Service: 
 
Web services 
 
API Testing 
Web services – Bray Leino Splash  
Splash Interactive is a full service digital marketing agency providing 
website design & development, CMS integration, user experience design, 
SEO, B2B marketing and social media marketing  
Responsibilities: 
 
Preparing the Test plan which covered the test activities, 
deliverable and evaluate the product status before release. 
 
Develop/revise test cases, test data, and test scripts for functional 
and non-functional requirements. 
 
Perform functional test at all levels of testing of new website 
features based on test cases /test procedures.  
 
Collaborate with FE, BE team to find out the best solution in 
development.  
 
Responsible for the system integration test in product deployment 
phase, ensure product go-live with high quality. 
 
Daily meeting and report the product status directly to Team 
leader/PM. 
 
Analyze areas need to be coverage by automation test based on 
OWASP ZAP, Selenium WebDriver, POM.    
Technologies used in project: 
 
.NET, PHP  
 
JavaScript, HTML5, CSS, Perl.   
 
Sitefinity, Kentico, Sitecore, Drupal, Umbraco.  
 
Jira, CSV, OWASP ZAP, Postman, Selenium WebDriver, TestNG, 
Jenkins, Maven, Eclipse.  
 
POM, Cucumber, Keyword driven.  
 
Google share, Jira.  
Achievements:  
 
Improving experiences and knowledge Web services (HTML, 
JavaScript, CSS),  
 
Improving negotiation and communication skills. 
 
Familiar with API testing by Postman tool. 
 
Familiar with almost CMS. 
 
Design automation script by OWASP ZAP, Selenium IDE.   
 
Familiar with the most framework in Automation fields. 
Testing Service: 
 
Mobile apps 
 
Performance  
 
Security 
 
Exploratory Test 
Web apps | Mobile apps – Global App Testing 
Working under freelancer QC engineer, executing testcase, UX/UI, 
functional testing mobile app.    
Responsibilities 
 
UAT, UX proposal, analyze & evaluate the quality of 
layout/mockup before deploying.  
 
Execute the testcase and make the report for almost mobile native 
app.    
 
Exploratory test, Adhoc to finding issues and reported them to bug 
trackers.  
Technologies used in project: 
 
 iOS (Xcode) & Android studio.  
 
JavaScript.    
 
Detox, Appium.  
Achievements :  
 
Improving experiences and knowledge Mobile apps testing.  
 
Improving the reading and analyzing the requirements or 
specification.  
 
Improving adhoc skills, finding issues as fast as possible.  
 
Familiar with multiple projects as well as diversity of testcases. 
 
Improving the testcase design techniques.    
Sep 2012 – Feb 2017: QA Engineer 
Testing Service: 
 
Embedded system 
 
Network and Linux 
Satellite Digital Television – Global Cybersoft VN  
This is Digital Television project that provide television and audio services 
to subscribers through satellite transmission from big vendor in North 
America. Performing all test activities on embedded system devices (set-
to-box).  
Responsibilities 
 
Investigate user requirements, system requirements, test 
specifications, and documents relate to project. 
 
Perform end-to-end testing of the work-flow almost full testing 
methodologies. 
 
Executing testcase and report issues into the JIRA bug tracking 
system. 
 
Expertise in test case scenario, test case execution and test 
improvement. 
 
Involve in Performance testing with test tool is programmed by 
team. 
 
Daily report product status, estimate levels of effort for remaining 
tests to manager.  
 
Analyzing of test reports to propose test case modification. 
 
Lead a small group for Ad-hoc testing to increase the product 
quality (Key man). 
Technologies used in project 
 
C++, Java 
 
Linux, Ubuntu 
 
Networking (DHCP, NAT, VPN…) 
 
Content delivery network, Streaming, Video on Demand.   
 
Shell, Python, Bash script, My SQL. 
Achievements:  
 
Strong testing process about testcase management, bug reports.  
 
Gathering the testing knowledge and experience in embedded 
devices.  
 
Improving the testcase execution & report issues skills.  
 
Familiar with executing testing in fast-paced environment with 
local and distributed locations.  
 
Familiar with Linux OS.  
 
Learning the management skills in small group. 
 
Improving the self-troubleshoot problems in Network 
configurations in LAN, Global.  
 
Achieving the CDN, Streaming, VOD technologies.  
EDUCATION AND CERTIFICATIONS 
 
BA in IT, Van Lang University 
 
ISTQB-CTFL
